mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(acct, name, createTime, lastLoginTime, mobile, email, description, status) VALUES(#{acct}, #{name}, #{createTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{description}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET acct=#{acct}, name = #{name}, createTime = #{createTime}, lastLoginTime=#{lastLoginTime}, mobile=#{mobile}, email=#{email}, description=#{description}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
